item.title: Ticket #595 (Calendar links broken with permalink without %day%) closed
item.dc:creator: ryan

item.title: Ticket #595 (Calendar links broken with permalink without %day%) updated
item.dc:creator: trombonekenny

item.title: Ticket #595 (Calendar links broken with permalink without %day%) created
item.dc:creator: trombonekenny
item.description:
My permalink structure is /%year%/%monthnum%/%postname%/ which breaks links in the calendar. The output for the links in the calendar comes out as ​http://www-dave.cs.uiuc.edu/wordpress/%yea instead of ​http://www-dave.cs.uiuc.edu/wordpress/2004/12/merry-merry/

Looking at the source, it looks like the problem is in get_day_link and some special manipulation it does for %day% If I put %day% in my permalink structure, the calendar works fine.

item.title: Ticket #594 (wp_specialchars doesn't sanitize single quotes due to typo) closed
item.dc:creator: ryan

item.title: Changeset [2001]: Fix single quote sanitization. Bug 594. Hat Tip: bcrow.
item.dc:creator: rboren
item.description: Fix single quote sanitization. Bug 594. Hat Tip: bcrow.

item.title: Ticket #594 (wp_specialchars doesn't sanitize single quotes due to typo) updated
item.dc:creator: bcrow

item.title: Ticket #594 (wp_specialchars doesn't sanitize single quotes due to typo) created
item.dc:creator: bcrow
item.description: The two string replaces for quotes in the function are meant to apply to double quotes first, and single quotes second. Because of a typo, double quotes are applied, but the expression to sanitize single quotes is the same original as the one for double quotes, and since double quotes were already sanitized, they aren't sanitized again, but single quotes still remain unaltered.

item.title: Ticket #593 (RSS Feed Breaks with German "Umlaute" in Firefox) updated
item.dc:creator: anonymousbugger

item.title: Ticket #593 (RSS Feed Breaks with German "Umlaute" in Firefox) created
item.dc:creator: anonymousbugger
item.description: If there is a german "Umlaut" like Ä,Ü or Ö in the title of a posting, the RSS Feed is not being created correctly. Firefox evens says "Feed failed to load". You can check my blogs Feed at ​http://www.wolfgang-dietl.at/wp-rss2.php , you'll see the error when adding it as live bookmark.

item.title: Ticket #592 (Cannot log in with 1.5) updated
item.dc:creator: solvingnormal
item.description:
I also want to clarify that after being returned to the login page, I cannot access the admin panel (by manually going to /wordpress/wp-admin/index.php); it simply returns me to the login page. It doesn't appear that a cookie is being set.

edited on: 12-25-04 03:24

item.title: Ticket #592 (Cannot log in with 1.5) updated
item.dc:creator: solvingnormal

item.title: Ticket #592 (Cannot log in with 1.5) created
item.dc:creator: solvingnormal
item.description:
The latest nightly (1.5-a6, 12/24/2004) doesn't allow login.

When entering an incorrect password, an error is generated (correctly).

When entering the correct password, the browser goes to ​http://www.solvingnormal.com/wordpress/wp-login.php?redirect_to=%2Fwordpress%2Fwp-admin%2Findex.php which simply redisplays the original login screen.

item.title: Ticket #591 (Password Protecting Posts does not work) updated
item.dc:creator: solvingnormal

item.title: Ticket #591 (Password Protecting Posts does not work) created
item.dc:creator: solvingnormal
item.description: Posts that are password protected cannot be viewed, even when the password is entered.
